mRuDAtIqdRuSE$ || 
kShEtra#sya patEq madhu#mantamUqrmi#M dhEqnuri#vaq payO# aqsmAsu# dhukShva |
maqdhuqScuta#M GRuqtami#vaq supU#tamRuqtasya# naqH pata#yO mRuDayantu ||
agnEq naya# suqpathA# rAqyE aqsmAn. viSvA#ni dEva vaqyunA#ni viqdvAn | 
yuqyOqddhya#sma-jju#hurAqNamEnOq BUyi#ShThAM tEq nama# uktiM ~MvidhEma ||
A dEqvAnAqmapiq panthA#maganmaq yacCaqknavA#maq tadanuq pravO#DhuM | 
aqgni rviqdvAn^^thsa ya#jAqth - [  ] 27
